content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. It's a beautiful space in a prime location, and I'm sure you'll find it very comfortable. Let's discuss the rent. What is your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I am a student and I am looking for a place with the lowest price possible. I am smart and I am not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. The apartment is nice, but I am sure we can agree on a lower price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand that you're a student and may be looking for a lower price. However, I must emphasize that this is a newly built apartment in the city center, which is not only modern and comfortable but also very close to all essential amenities. The location is highly sought after, which is reflected in the market value of the rent. Nevertheless, I'm willing to negotiate a fair price that reflects both the quality of the apartment and your financial situation as a student. How much are you comfortable paying per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. The apartment is nice, but it is unfurnished and has only one bedroom. I am a student and I only need a small place to live. I am willing to pay 300 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 300 Euro per month is significantly lower than the market value for this apartment. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must maintain a fair price that reflects the property's worth. The location, quality, and amenities of this apartment command a higher rent. Would you be open to discussing a price that is closer to the market value?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I understand your situation. The apartment is indeed in a good location and has good amenities. However, I am a student and I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 400 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 400 Euro per month is more in line with the value of the apartment, but it's still below the market rate. I appreciate your effort to reach a fair agreement. Considering your status as a student, I'm willing to make a concession. How about 450 Euro per month? This would be a special rate for you, reflecting our mutual desire to establish a good relationship.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your understanding. The apartment is nice and I like it. I am willing to pay 450 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that you're willing to pay 450 Euro per month. It's a fair price, considering the location and the amenities the apartment offers. We can proceed with the rental agreement at this price. Is there anything else we need to discuss before finalizing the contract?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. There is nothing else to discuss. I agree to the price of [450] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Wonderful! I'm pleased to have reached an agreement with you. The apartment will be yours at 450 Euro per month. We'll proceed with the rental contract, and I'm sure you'll enjoy living in such a prime location. Is there anything specific you would like to include in the contract, or are you happy with the standard terms?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I am happy with the standard terms. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
